page.title: 06Customs - Playground Games
page.content: Children at school play traditional games of football, rounders, cricket and tennis. There are also other games played mainly by girls.{Polo.}1 person is 'on' and choses a subject. The others think of different aspects of the subject which are then shouted out. The person who is 'on' picks one of the aspects of the subject and whoever chose it has to race to the wall and back and shout 'Polo' before the other person does. If they fail to do so they are out of the game.{Peggy {leggy.}This is a variation of 'Polo'. Instead of racing against each other, they fold their arms and stand on one leg and try to make the other person put their leg down.{Chain tic. }Played by 5 boys or more. 1 Person is on. When they catch another person and hold hands and so on. When everyone is caught the game begins again.
